1101010111100000 1000101100010011 0 -> sum: 0110000011110011, cout: 1
1000000011000100 0000110100001000 0 -> sum: 1000110111001100, cout: 0
0101001011011111 0110000010110111 0 -> sum: 1011001110010110, cout: 0
1010011000011011 0011001110001101 0 -> sum: 1101100110101000, cout: 0
1111001000101011 0100001111101010 1 -> sum: 0011011000010110, cout: 1
0001110111001001 0001101000100110 1 -> sum: 0011011111110000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
